ygData.subject: Solo ing a SG
ygData.msgSnippet: Either I am incredibly stupid or it is just not possible to solo a SG at 35. Everything I cast in the form of root gets resisted. And without Jboots/SOW it
ygData.messageBody:
Either I am incredibly stupid or it is just not possible to solo a SG
at 35. Everything I cast in the form of root gets resisted. And without
Jboots/SOW it
becomes very dangerous.

I am sure that once I get the root on - I will be able to kill it - but
how do I go about solo-ing a SG if I cant root it ?

I have heard of 35 Wizzies that can do it - but I just have never seen
them do it.

ANY TIPS ?
